segments.text: Hello , let me introduce myself . I'm your neighbor . My name is Shirley .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Shirley . I'm Sophie . It's nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is a little gift for your family . It's a calendar with all the community events on it . I hope it can be helpful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since we are neighbors , if you need any help or anything , please come to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will . Actually , I am worried so much about the security of this community because my house has been burgled twice before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , don't worry about that here . There are security guards on duty 24 hours a day and they patrol all over the neighborhood . You know , they are all very strong .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? That's good . Is there any supermarket in our neighborhood ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . There is a Carrefour near the neighborhood . I'll show you there if you want to .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the way , a party will be held for new neighbors the day after tomorrow . I hope I can see you there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , and we can get to know each other at the party .
segments.speaker: S2
